SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_action_info a WHERE 1=1
AND a.action_name like '%'||#{actionName} ||'%' CONCAT('%', #{actionName} , '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.status=#{status}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
